pageContext.title: MiniStatement
pageContext.description: HaloPesa enables you to access your transactional statement and balances of your HaloPesa account at any time you want. It is convenient and reliable no need to visit a HaloPesa branch From purchasing bundles and airtime to Paying bills HaloPesa gives you a wide range of products and services to choose from.
